name: Thought Propulsion
tagline: Strategic Software Research and Development Services
body:
Thought Propulsion™ launches your new products. From scouting new concepts or researching technology alternatives, to developing your team and processes, we deliver the goods.

We offer a deep understanding of the software development process, system architecture, and security with broad industry experience in banking, finance, and healthcare. Add Thought Propulsion™ to your team and boost your prospects today.

Thoughtfully Yours,  
Bill Burcham  
Main Propeller  
[propeller@thoughtpropulsion.com](mailto:propeller@thoughtpropulsion.com)  
@Bill
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
